Prompt: How can I search for pet shops near my location on Petofy?
Response:
To search for a pet shop near you through Petofy, visit https://petofy.com/Home/ or use our mobile app. Now follow these steps:
- Go to PetShops under Find services.
- Select your city from the list.
- Select the Nearest PetShop. Make sure you are logged into your Petofy account.
